1.content:
Following the overpopulation of 2100 and mass starvation that followed, the World Government declared that all males between 12-21 were fair game to become food for the plate of ANYONE able to catch them.

At first just boymeat restaurants popped up, but soon their were so many boys to be eaten that mass production began. Boy processing factories opened up, producing boy meat for the supermarket SHELVES.

It REPLACED beef and chicken as the main food of choice in the west. To fill the quota anyone under 18 who committed a crime, no matter
how tiny, was turned into delicious meat, but that wasn't enough so soon the government began encouraging parents to sell off spare children for cash.

Finally, the government began using school to teach children that becoming meat was great. Mass brainwashing some called it, but not many people complained because now their was even more delicious meat that VOLUNTEERED to be on your plate.

To combat the gender unbalance, some genius scientist invented a drug that when put into the water supply made sure that 80% of children born were male. 60% of boys would end up food before 18, and so population was controlled and the HUMAN race prospers to this day.

You're a boy in this new brave age; so how old are you?
1.title: The beginning of the End

11.content:
Adam is fourteen year old boy; he is good looking and successful, the captain of the under 15's soccer team and has a body surprisingly toned for his age. He was born to an average family, but he inherited his good looks from his father. He has short spiked blonde hair, a smattering of freckles on his nose, light green eyes and tanned skin from long days of skateboarding or playing basketball shirtless with his friends.

He is well hung for his age, with a uncut 6" penis and a pair of heavy balls about the size of golf balls. He discovered how it use it at only 12 and lost his virginity in the butt of his best friend Liam not long after. All the girls and boys at school swoon over him, and he's happy to please them all - he'd say he's bisexual, but his friends say he's simply "sexual" and would have sex with anything.

Where shall Adam start his day?

info.brief_description: Any boy 12-18 is fair game as food.
info.description:
Following massive overpopulation and the starvation that followed, the World Government issued a decree that any boy between the ages of 12 and 18 could be used as food to anyone who could catch them.

Only Boys as food, they can be willing, or unwilling.
Fetishes are allowed, feet, etc
Raw, cooked, butchered or alive and even processed, anything goes.
other than that, anything goes, if a character is eaten, you can begin as a new character, or end it there, up to you.
